The release version is now dynamically updated in the source at build time.

change.msg: Support for 1.5 generics and simplified for loops in jde-complete

change.msg: jde-parse-get-buffer-class is now interactive and also returns class names sans packages.

change.author: Paul Landes
change.msg: New addition of class driven bookmarks (jde-bookmark.el).

change.author: Paul Landes
change.msg: Beanshell can optionally display a separate buffer for errors based on customized variable `jde-bsh-separate-buffer'.

change.author: Paul Landes
change.msg: New function `jde-parse-class-name' parses class name into package name parts so we don't have to pass around fully qualified type flags to functions that need this--i.e. source finding functions.

change.author: Paul Landes
change.msg: New function `jde-read-class' provides better user input class finding.

change.author: Paul Landes
change.msg: New function `jde-exception-goto' provides a way to go to a file and line number from an exception stack trace line..

change.author: Paul Landes
change.msg: More robust jde-eval, which now doesn't get confused with extraneous show() output. This feature can be turned off..

change.author: Paul Landes
change.msg: More parsing ability (i.e. reverse camel notation parsing, which replaces some key bindings, convert from reverse camel notation to other variable formats like SQL, Java properties, hungarian notation, C constants, etc. parse Beanshell/Java expressions).
